name: Improved Second Chance

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Second Chance, base attack bonus +11.

sections.body: When you reroll a missed attack using the Second Chance feat, you can still make the rest of your attacks that turn, albeit at a –5 penalty to each attack.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: When using the Second Chance feat, you must normally forgo the rest of your attacks that turn.
sections.name: Normal

description: You can turn a missed strike into a second chance without sacrificing later attacks.
